EmailTemplate.name: Work Order is moved to 8.1 On Shelf for Local Pickup/Delivery
EmailTemplate.subject: Work Order {!Order.OrderNumber} - 8.1 On Shelf for Local Pickup/Delivery
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear Phunion,
{!Order.OrderNumber} for {!Order.WOAccountLink__c} has been QC'd and is ready for pickup/delivery on the pickup shelves. Please coordinate with the client and add any Thank You items to the boxes as needed.
{!Order.WONameLink__c}
Thanks,
Ralph the Rooster
